short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TGenAI - AI/LLM-Powered Test Case Generator & Automated Test Creator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome plugin is a powerful tool that generates test cases directly from web pages. Furthermore, it provides automation code for popular testing frameworks such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, and Cucumber. Users can select from various programming languages including Java, Python, JavaScript, and C#. This plugin streamlines the testing process, making it efficient and hassle-free.
